hits.definition:
蒙

[méng] to cover, ignorant

[mēng] cheat

[Měng] 蒙古 Měnggǔ Mongolia

票

[piào] ticket

坚 (F 堅)

[jiān] hard, solid, firmly; 坚持 persist; 坚定 firm

端

[duān] hold sth. level with both hands, extremity, end

靠

[kào] lean on, rely on, keep close to, come up to, near

杂 (F 雜)

[zá] mixed; 复杂 fùzá complicated;

    杂志 zázhì magazine

[zā] 拉里拉杂 lālilāzā rambling

贵 (F 貴)

[guì] expensive, valuable

怒

[nù] anger, rage

稿

[gǎo] stalk of grain, draft, sketch, manuscript

拍

[pāi] clap, paddle; 乒乓拍 pīngpāngpāi ping-pong paddle

率

[lǜ] rate, proportion; 频率 pínlǜ frequency

[shuài] 率领 shuàilǐng lead, command

旧 (F 舊)

[jiù] old (not new) (compare with 老 lǎo old, not young; 新 xīn new)

掉

[diào] drop, fall

啦

[la] corresponding to 了 le plus 啊 a, <interjection indicating excitement/doubt>

[lā] 呼啦啦 hūlālā flapping sound

[lá] 啦啦 lálá chat, gossip, jaw; 啦呱 láguā chat, gossip

授

[shòu] award, give; teach; 教授 jiàoshòu professor

守

[shǒu] guard; 保守 bǎoshǒu conservative

油

[yóu] oil; 汽油 qìyóu gasoline; 酱油 jiàngyóu soy sauce

[yōu] 绿油油 lǜyōuyōu bright/fresh green; 碧油油

bìyōuyōu bluish green
